field.label: Name
field.help: Name of the route-map, used in neighbor configuration.

field.label: Action
field.help: Set permit for match or deny to negate the rule.

field.label: ID
field.help: Route-map ID (1-65535). Sorting is managed automatically.

field.label: AS-Path List
field.help: Select the AS-Path List. If multiples with the same name exist, selecting one is enough.

field.label: Prefix List
field.help: Select the Prefix List. If multiples with the same name exist, selecting one is enough.

field.label: Community List
field.help: Select the Community List. If multiples with the same name exist, selecting one is enough.

field.label: Set
field.help: Free text field for setting attributes, e.g., “local-preference 300” or “community 1:1”.
